TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListViewGroupCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents the collection of groups within a control.

span.span: Represents the collection of groups within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取与关联控件。Use the property to get the associated with a control. 此集合包含表示控件中显示的组的对象时属性设置为值。This collection contains the objects that represent the groups shown in the control when the property is set to a value other than . 未分配给组的任何项将显示在默认组中，具有标头标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 如果没有在组禁用收集，分组功能。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled. 使用方法将单个组添加到集合。Use the method to add a single group to the collection. 使用方法在集合中的特定索引处添加组。Use the method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. 若要删除某个组，使用方法。To remove a group, use the method. 使用方法移除特定索引处的组。Use the method to remove the group at a particular index. 无法添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 若要重新定位在集合中的组，它必须首先从该集合，然后再插入到所需的位置。To reposition a group within the collection, it must first be removed from the collection, and then inserted at the desired location. 使用方法来确定特定组是否已在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. 若要检索的集合中的组的索引，使用方法。To retrieve the index of a group within the collection, use the method. 你可以获取或设置与特定索引处的组索引器。You can get or set the group at a particular index with the indexer. 使用方法将多个组添加到集合。Use the method to add multiple groups to the collection. 可以将多个组添加作为数组的组或作为通过检索另一个属性控件。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a that you retrieve through the property of another control. 使用方法从集合中移除所有组。Use the method to remove all the groups from the collection. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法从集合中删除组，但不是删除任何项从控件。The , , and methods remove groups from the collection, but do not remove any items from the control. 如果没有在组集合，分组功能被禁用，并且通常显示在控件中的所有项。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled and all items in the control are displayed normally. 和方法都很有用，当你想要提供了多个方法中的项进行分组时控件。The and methods are useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要执行此操作，创建组的多个阵列。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法将添加可显示的组的下一步的数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the next array of groups to display. 使用方法可将组复制到兼容的数组指定索引处开始集合中。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection to a compatible array starting at a specified index. 这很有用，例如，如果你想要在集合中使用组排序方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要执行此操作，将组复制到兼容的数组，然后对数组进行排序。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下来，使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法以将已排序的数组添加回集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. 使用属性来确定在集合中的组数。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 若要循环访问集合，使用从返回方法。To iterate through the collection, use the returned from the method. > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序调用时，分组功能才可用仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上方法。The grouping feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上将忽略与组相关的任何代码，并且组将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 因此，取决于分组功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 你可能想要包括的测试，确定分组功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要提供替代的排序不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行时。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入标记功能由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用分组功能，以便按的详细信息视图中的子项值组织的项。The following example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题对项排序到为该列创建的组。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击相同的列标题反转组的顺序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加现有到集合。Use this method to add an existing to the collection. 无法添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 当调用方法使用已在集合中，添加将失败，则返回-1。When you call the method using a that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要将多个组添加到集合中，使用方法。To add multiple groups to the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此版本的方法将一个组数组添加到组集合。Use this version of the method to add an array of groups to the group collection. 此方法很有用，当你创建多个对象，并想要将它们添加到具有单个方法调用的集合。This method is useful when you create multiple objects and want to add them to the collection with a single method call. 若要将各个组添加到集合中，使用方法。To add individual groups to the collection, use the method. 当你想要提供了多个方法中的项进行分组时，此方法也是有用控件。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要执行此操作，创建组的多个阵列。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法可添加其他组的数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. 与不同方法，方法不具有可以用于确定所添加的组是否已在集合中返回值。Unlike the method, the method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection. 如果你需要此信息，请使用方法，然后才能使用方法。If you need this information, use the method before using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法可以使用的应用程序将组织中按的详细信息视图中的子项值的项。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在以及子项文本或首字母哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，处于未选中状态。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然后检索对应于所单击的列的哈希表和每个项分配给相应的组。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最后，在哈希表的组的已排序的数组添加到。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中移除所有组。Use this method to remove all the groups from the collection. 请注意，删除组从集合不会删除项从控件。Note that removing groups from the collection does not remove items from the control. 此方法可用于禁用分组功能。This method is useful to disable the grouping feature. 当没有在组控制，项通常会出现。When there are no groups in a control, the items appear normally. 若要从集合中删除单个组，请使用或方法。To remove individual groups from the collection, use the or method. 此方法也是有用的如果你想要提供多种方式对项进行分组。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items. 若要更改分组，请先使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法可添加其他组的数组。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法可以使用的应用程序将组织中按的详细信息视图中的子项值的项。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在以及子项文本或首字母哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，处于未选中状态。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然后检索对应于所单击的列的哈希表和每个项分配给相应的组。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最后，在哈希表的组的已排序的数组添加到。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法添加到多次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 但是，尝试将添加另一个副本将不引发异常。However, attempting to add another copy will not throw an exception. 相反，添加将只需将失败。Instead, the addition will simply fail. 方法将在此情况下返回值 – 1。The method will return a value of –1 in this case. 和方法，但是，不会返回值。The and methods, however, do not have return values. 添加组使用这些方法之一，使用方法来确定是否特定已在集合中。When adding groups using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular is already in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以将集合 （包括它们所包含的项引用） 中的组复制到兼容的数组，从指定索引处开始。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 这很有用，例如，如果你想要在集合中使用组排序方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要执行此操作，将组复制到兼容的数组，然后对数组进行排序。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下来，使用方法从集合中移除所有组，然后使用方法以将已排序的数组添加回集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中删除组时必须对组的引用。Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have a reference to the group. 请注意该删除一组通过集合不会删除项从控件。Note that removing a group from the collection does not remove items from the control. 若要删除位于特定索引处的组，使用方法相反。To remove a group at a particular index, use the method instead. 若要从集合中移除所有组，使用方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中删除组，如果必须在集合中的组的索引。Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have the index of the group within the collection. 请注意，删除组从集合不会删除项从控件。Note that removing groups from the collection does not remove items from the control. 若要删除组使用对对象的引用，使用方法相反。To remove a group using a reference to the object, use the method instead. 若要从集合中移除所有组，使用方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method. 当从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection. 删除有关已移除的项的所有信息。All information about the removed item is deleted.
